transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan sir, IndiaMART se bol raha hoon.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Ji sir, abhi ke liye na maine legal mein jo hai na concern raise kar diya hai.
Executive: Toh jaise hi revert aayega main aapko fir call karke update karta hoon sir. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Okay.
Executive: Yeh main just information ke liye aapko...
summary:
Concerns:

- Following up on a previously raised concern.


Resolution:

- Informed that the concern has been raised with the legal department.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Executive will call back with an update after receiving a response from the legal team.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- concern, legal department, update, follow-up call
